publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1039 Brian Adam: Moratorium on GM Crop Farm Scale Trials—That the Parliament notes with concern the importation of GM contaminated seed; regrets the Scottish Executive’s decision to proceed with the GM crop trial despite substantial concerns; has no confidence in the farm scale trial currently underway at Daviot, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to abandon the trial and introduce immediately a moratorium on further farm scale trials.

S1M-1039 Brian Adam: Moratorium on GM Crop Farm Scale Trials—That the Parliament notes with concern the importation of GM contaminated seed; regrets the Scottish Executive’s decision to proceed with the GM crop trial despite substantial concerns; has no confidence in the farm scale trial currently underway at Daviot, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to abandon the trial and introduce immediately a moratorium on further farm scale trials.
S1M-1039 Moratorium on GM Crop Farm Scale Trials (lodged on 21 June 2000) Ms Sandra White*, Fergus Ewing*, Colin Campbell*, Mr John Swinney*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1039 Moratorium on GM Crop Farm Scale Trials (lodged on 21 June 2000) Alex Neil*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-1039 Moratorium on GM Crop Farm Scale Trials (lodged on 21 June 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-1039 Brian Adam: Moratorium on GM Crop Farm Scale Trials—That the Parliament notes with concern the importation of GM contaminated seed; regrets the Scottish Executive’s decision to proceed with the GM crop trial despite substantial concerns; has no confidence in the farm scale trial currently underway at Daviot, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to abandon the trial and introduce immediately a moratorium on further farm scale trials. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Fergus Ewing, Colin Campbell, Mr John Swinney, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alex Neil, Irene McGugan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani
